availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Lincoln County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Ellen McRoberts. Father of Susan McRoberts, Belle McRoberts, Benjamin McRoberts, Elizabeth McRoberts, and George McRoberts. Farmer in Lincoln County in 1850 and in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln Count], p. 99.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln County, Stanford, p. 87.
